remarks: The identity of the original category is contained in each subcategory.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
subcidcl.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( Subcat ` C ) ) $.
subcidcl.2 $e |- ( ph -> J Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
subcidcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
subcidcl.1 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
subcidcl $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) e. ( X J X ) ) $.
